# Overview

![](./overview.png)

# List

1.  [DOC (ÖAW)](https://stipendien.oeaw.ac.at/en/fellowships/doc)

-   max. 2 years after completion of diplom/Master
-   duration: 24-36 months

2.  [L'Oreal (ÖAW)](https://stipendien.oeaw.ac.at/en/fellowships/loreal-austria)

-   for women
-   to finish your PhD or to write a Post-Doc proposal
-   duration: 6-12 months

3.  [APART-MINT (ÖAW)](https://stipendien.oeaw.ac.at/en/fellowships/apart-mint)

-   max. 3 years after completion of PhD
-   duration: 12 months

4.  [doc.funds (FWF)](https://www.fwf.ac.at/en/funding/portfolio/careers/docfunds)

-   with 5 researchers
-   duration: 4 years#

5.  [doc.funds.connect (FWF)](https://www.fwf.ac.at/en/funding/portfolio/careers/docfundsconnect)

-   with 5 researchers from different institutions
-   duration: 4 years

6.  [ESPRIT (FWF)](https://www.fwf.ac.at/en/funding/portfolio/careers/esprit)

-   max. 5 years after completion of PhD
-   duration: 36 months

7.  [Max Kade (ÖAW)](https://stipendien.oeaw.ac.at/en/fellowships/max-kade)

-   to visit the USA
-   max. 5 years after completion of PhD
-   duration: 12 months

8.  [Erwin Schrödinger (FWF)](https://www.fwf.ac.at/en/funding/portfolio/careers/erwin-schroedinger)

-   early stage post-docs
-   duration: 36 months (10-24 months abroad)

9.  [ASTRA Awards (FWF)](https://www.fwf.ac.at/en/funding/portfolio/careers/fwf-astra-awards)

-   2-9 years after completion of PhD
-   duration: 5 years

10. [Science Communication](https://www.fwf.ac.at/en/funding/portfolio/communication/science-communication)

-   ongoing FWF project of max. 3 years after completion of project
-   duration: 24 months

11. [Top Citizen Science](https://www.fwf.ac.at/en/funding/portfolio/communication/top-citizen-science)

-   ongoing FWF project
-   only by the project leader
-   not for salary
-   duration: 24 months
